colour.models.RED_COLOR_3_COLOURSPACE¶

colour.models.RED_COLOR_3_COLOURSPACE = RGB_Colourspace(REDcolor3, [[ 0.70118104, 0.32901416], [ 0.3006003 , 0.68378883], [ 0.10815446, -0.00868818]], [ 0.32168, 0.33767], D60, [[ 0.48783011, 0.34327367, 0.1215423 ], [ 0.22890381, 0.78085982, -0.00976364], [-0.02100759, 0.01782699, 1.01200579]], [[ 2.56106255, -1.11859979, -0.31837666], [-0.74992837, 1.6079051 , 0.10557945], [ 0.06637384, -0.05154436, 0.97966783]], <function log_encoding_REDLogFilm>, <function log_decoding_REDLogFilm>, False, False)¶

REDcolor3 colourspace.
